reviews.review_msg: Colette is one of the few profs at sfu who know how to create a comfortable and trusting classroom environment. Had some of the most vibrant discussions in this course! Also, she's very up to date with literary analyses - spatial theory, digital humanities, etc.  She's also helpful outside of the class! Very interested in student work!
bad professor. Not open to other ideas. His way or the highway. DON'T BE LATE FOR CLASS OR HE WILL EMBARRASS YOU IN FRONT OF EVERYONE
Useless prof, so boring in class. Do not take a class with him. Probably turns off more people to English then the subject itself.
